attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would like to add to the petition to give singer Engelbert Humperdinck the knighthood he so rightly deserves.  After 40 years in the business of entertaining he deserves one.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
